name: Car Chase - Escape from cops
description:
Have you ever tried avoiding cops cars?
It is risky in real life indeed but what if you try the speed simulation game at your fingertips?

Escape from cop cars, trucks, tanks and helicopters in this endless high speed chase game. Maneuver around by either using the joystick or tap controls. Enable combo scoring by letting cops come close to you.

This application is endless car game. You can play for free completely.

Game Features: 
- Unlimited challenges
- Many different vehicles
- Leaderboards
- Amazing music and graphics
- Easy playability
